statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_distribution;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM pharmaceutical_distribution WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_distribution WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM pharmaceutical_distribution GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_distribution ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_distribution WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, location FROM pharmaceutical_distribution WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_distribution WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' AND location = 'California' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_distribution WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM pharmaceutical_distribution GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bottlenecks;
SELECT location, bottleneck_description, id FROM Bottlenecks;
SELECT improvement_description, implemented_date FROM ProcessImprovements;
SELECT * FROM Bottlenecks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, bottleneck_description FROM Bottlenecks WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM Bottlenecks WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, location FROM Bottlenecks WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT b.location, p.improvement_description, p.implemented_date FROM Bottlenecks b INNER JOIN ProcessImprovements p ON b.id = p.bottleneck_id WHERE p.improvement_description LIKE '%efficiency%';
SELECT b.id, COUNT(*) AS improvement_count FROM Bottlenecks b INNER JOIN ProcessImprovements p ON b.id = p.bottleneck_id GROUP BY b.id HAVING improvement_count > 3 ORDER BY improvement_count DESC;

SELECT b.*, p.improvement_description, p.implemented_date FROM Bottlenecks b LEFT JOIN ProcessImprovements p ON b.id = p.bottleneck_id WHERE p.implemented_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.implemented_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Bottlenecks;
SELECT location, bottleneck_description FROM Bottlenecks ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT improvement_name, implementation_date FROM ProcessImprovements WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT distributor, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PharmaceuticalDistribution GROUP BY distributor;
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalDistribution WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM Bottlenecks ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, bottleneck_type, bottleneck_description FROM Bottlenecks WHERE location = 'Factory' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_bottlenecks FROM Bottlenecks GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, product_name, distributor, quantity FROM PharmaceuticalDistribution WHERE quantity > 1000 ORDER BY quantity DESC, shipment_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ProcessImprovements ORDER BY implementation_date DESC, improvement_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM BottleneckIdentification;
SELECT id, bottleneck_name FROM BottleneckIdentification ORDER BY bottleneck_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProcessImprovements WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, improvement_name, implementation_date FROM ProcessImprovements WHERE impact_metrics LIKE '%cost%';
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM PharmaceuticalDistribution WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BottleneckIdentification WHERE analysis_date = '2021-10-20';
SELECT bottleneck_name, identified_cause FROM BottleneckIdentification WHERE identified_cause LIKE '%resource%';
SELECT * FROM ProcessImprovements ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM PharmaceuticalDistribution WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100;
SELECT efficiency_metrics FROM SupplyChainEfficiency WHERE implementation_date > '2021-01-01' AND implementation_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturers INNER JOIN products ON manufacturers.manufacturer_id = products.manufacturer_id
SELECT SUM(price * quantity) AS total_cost FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_name = orders.product_name
SELECT product_name, quantity, shipment_date FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id
